DECLARE @tableName AS varchar(128) = '{1}' DECLARE @columnName AS varchar(128) = '{2}' DECLARE @value AS varchar(10) = {3} DECLARE @reportSessionId AS varchar(256) = ', ''{4}''' DECLARE @objectType AS varchar(50) = ', ''NULL''' DECLARE @colID AS varchar(10) = '''NULL'', ' DECLARE @colNameOrSubj AS varchar(50) = '''NULL'', '
IF COL_LENGTH(@tableName, 'Id') IS NOT NULL SET @colID = '[Id], '
IF @tableName = 'sungero_wf_task' BEGIN SET @colNameOrSubj = '[Subject], ' SET @objectType = ', ''Задача''' END ELSE IF @tableName = 'sungero_wf_assignment' BEGIN SET @colNameOrSubj = '[Subject], ' SET @objectType = ', ''Задание''' END ELSE IF @tableName = 'sungero_wf_attachment' BEGIN SET @colNameOrSubj = 'CONCAT(''ИД Задачи = '', [Task]), ' SET @objectType = ', ''Вложение''' END ELSE IF @tableName = 'sungero_core_substitution' BEGIN SET @colNameOrSubj = '[Name], ' SET @objectType = ', ''Замещение''' END ELSE IF @tableName = 'sungero_core_recipient' BEGIN SET @colNameOrSubj = '[Name], ' SET @objectType = ', ''Реципиент''' END ELSE IF @tableName = 'sungero_docflow_project' BEGIN SET @colNameOrSubj = '[Name], ' SET @objectType = ', ''Проект''' END ELSE IF @tableName = 'sungero_content_edoc' BEGIN SET @colNameOrSubj = '[Name], ' SET @objectType = ', ''Документ''' END ELSE IF COL_LENGTH(@tableName, 'Name') IS NOT NULL BEGIN SET @colNameOrSubj = '[Name], ' SET @objectType = ', ''Объект (' + @tableName + ')''' END ELSE BEGIN SET @colNameOrSubj = 'CONCAT(''Коллекция объекта = '', [Discriminator]), ' SET @objectType = ', ''Коллекция (' + @tableName + ')''' END
IF (@colID != '''NULL'', ' OR @colNameOrSubj != '''NULL'', ' OR @objectType != ', ''NULL''') BEGIN exec('INSERT INTO {0} SELECT ' + @colID + @colNameOrSubj + '''' + @tableName + '''' + @objectType + @reportSessionId + ', ''' + @columnName + ''' FROM ' + @tableName + ' WHERE ' + @columnName + ' = ' + @value + '') END
